title: Three Decades After Her Parents Thought She'd Died, She Returned In Their Lives But As A Son

Three Decades After Her Parents Thought She'd Died, She Returned In Their Lives But As A Son

Three Decades After Her Parents Thought She'd Died, She Returned In Their Lives But As A Son

Tina Bejarano was 17 years old when she gave birth to a baby girl, but 15 minutes after her birth, Bejarano’s mother told her that the baby had died.

She was devastated and fell into depression; she would cry for hours but she was shocked when nearly after three decades she learnt that her daughter is alive and has turned into a guy.

According to reports, Bejanaro’s mother was not supportive of her pregnancy. But, Bejarano and her husband, Eric Gardere, would celebrate their child’s birth anniversary every year. It was a hard time for the couple after the death of their child.

But after nearly three decades, Tina and Eric’s daughter took a DNA test and found that she was related to them. This is when the 29-year-old (now a man), emailed his parents and wrote, ‘I think we need to talk, it says we're related, and it says you're my mom’.

"I don't care. I don't care if he's in transition. I don't care if he hasn't transitioned. I don't care. That's my kid. We're just glad he's alive," Bejarano told KMPH. "Looking at him just makes me want to cry."

Five days after Kristin was born, she was adopted by a family. He grew up in Las Vegas, but lives with his child and wife in New Jersey. He would be meeting his mother for the first time in Los Banos in November.
